T02D3258:16b-1: dhva dz'a gra ke y'ur s'a dha nam /
T02D3258:16b-3: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyang gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3258:16b-4: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dbung rgyan sku mdog nag mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi ma'o //
T02D3258:16b-5: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni dmar mo dang ljang gu'o //
T02D3258:16b-6: ral gri dang zhags pa bsnams pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis so //
T02D3258:16b-7: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga dang 'khor lo
T02D3258:16b-8: ni g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na ste sgra kham ser
T02D3258:16b-10: dbu la thod pa skam po lngas rgyan du mdzad pa stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3258:16b-11: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs par gyur pa gsus pa
T02D3258:16b-12: 'phyang bar gyur pa g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis nyi
T02D3258:16b-13: ma'i gdan dang 'od zer can te /
T02D3258:16b-14: stod shag ser po mnabs par gyur pa dang /
T02D3258:16b-15: sa bon ni h'um dang dbu rgyan la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3258:16b-16: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs aa
